item.title: 2021hdu多校1
item.description: Puzzle loop hdu6952 // Author: HolyK // Created: Tue Jul 20 17:38:11 2021 #include <bits/stdc++.h> #define dbg(a...)fprintf(stderr,a) template <class T, class U> inline bool smin(T &x, const U &y) { return y < x ? x = y, 1 : 0; } template <class T, class U> inline bool smax(T &x, const U &y) { return x < y ? x = y, 1 : 0; } using LL = long long; using PII = std::pair<int, int>; constexpr int P(998244353); inline void inc(int &x, int y) { x += y; if (x >= P) x -= P; } int fpow(int x, int k = P - 2) { int r = 1; for (; k; k >>= 1, x = 1LL * x * x % P) { if (k & 1) r = 1LL * r * x % P; } return r; } constexpr int N(17 * 16 * 2 + 5); using BTS = std::bitset<N>; BTS p[N], tmp; bool ins(BTS &x) { for (int i = N - 1; i >= 0; i--) { if (!
